name: Suffer Moves
description: When you bear the brunt of a failed action or make a concession, the suffer moves help resolve the cost. These moves are typically made when you must @Compendium[foundry-ironsworn.starforgedmoves.78baa51694fe37c5]{Pay the Price} and face a hardship that directly impacts your well-being and readiness, or as prompted by a move or asset.
